source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: The Ultimate iOS 10, Xcode 8 Developer course. Build 30 apps

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.title: John Bura

items.headline: Learn to become a virtuosic developer with the most comprehensive iOS development course ever produced.
objectives_summary: Learn how to Code in Swift 3.0
Design apps from scratch in Xcode, Illustrator and Photoshop
Build apps quickly from start to finish

items.title: Xamarin Forms 2.0 - Beginner to Advanced

visible_instructors.job_title: Former Google Engineer and Professional App Developer
visible_instructors.name: Grant
visible_instructors.title: Grant Klimaytys

items.headline: Code cross platform apps with the latest release of Xamarin Forms 2.0
objectives_summary: Use Xamarin Forms like a professional
Use SQLite Databases in a cross-platform manner
Use shared settings in a cross-platform manner

items.title: I want to connect my Xamarin Forms app to REST API
items.headline: In less than 3hours, learn how to create a REST API with ASP.NET Core and call it from Xamarin Forms app (iOS & Android)
objectives_summary: Develop mobile app prototype
Understand how REST web services works with mobile apps
Implement CRUD operations' calls with user interface

items.title: Android Material Design
items.headline: Introduction, Implementation and Mastering. All in one!
objectives_summary: Implementing Material Design Feature at the end of this course will be a piece of cake for students
The concept of this awesome feature provided for Android App Development will be crystal clear.

items.title: PhoneGap Build For Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to use PhoneGap build service to build Hybrid Mobile Apps.
objectives_summary: What is Phonegap
Pros and cons of Phonegap
Phonegap vs. Cordova

items.title: Mobile App Development for Beginners (Swift 3, iPhone iOS10)

visible_instructors.job_title: Freelance Developer with over 120 Apps Developed
visible_instructors.name: Dee Aliyu
visible_instructors.title: Dee Aliyu Odumosu

items.headline: iPhone (iOS 10) app development. The complete development course. Use Swift 3 & Xcode 8 to design 10 iPhone apps.
objectives_summary: After completing this course, you'll be able to call yourself an iOS developer
You'll be able to create your own apps.
You'll be able to work as a freelance app developer (on small projects).

items.title: Ionic 3 - Learn How to Design Ionic Apps
items.headline: Improve your Ionic Framework knowledge by learning how to design & develop Ionic Mobile Apps.
objectives_summary: Design & Develop Ionic Apps
Freelance as Ionic App Designers
Design and Develop Ionic App Themes for Resale

items.title: SwiftUI 2.0 Apps on iPhone, iPad, Mac, Watch & TV

visible_instructors.job_title: Mobile and Web Developer - iOS, Android, Django, Python. etc
visible_instructors.name: Nick
visible_instructors.title: Nick Walter

items.headline: Make Apps and Widgets for iOS 14, macOS 11, watchOS 7 and tvOS 14 using Xcode 12, Swift 5, WidgetKit and Apple Watch
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of SwiftUI Views
Data Flow in SwiftUI
Creating Widgets with SwiftUI

items.title: Apple Watch Programming for iOS Developers - WatchOS 3 Apps

visible_instructors.job_title: Mobile and Web Developer - iOS, Android, Django, Python. etc
visible_instructors.name: Nick
visible_instructors.title: Nick Walter

items.headline: Using Xcode 8 and Swift 3, learn how to make 3 complete WatchKit apps
objectives_summary: Make WatchOS 3 Apps

items.title: SAP Fiori Simplified: For ABAPers

visible_instructors.job_title: Fiori Expert, SAP Mentor, SAP Press Author
visible_instructors.name: Krishna Kishor
visible_instructors.title: Krishna Kishor Kammaje

items.headline: Specially developed crash course for ABAPers
objectives_summary: Understand the Fiori Architecture
Understand various Fiori concepts like OData, SPA, UI5 and Gateway
Get a direction on where to start Fiori learning for an ABAPer

items.title: From Sketch Design to iOS App with Swift and Xcode
items.headline: Master Creating Custom User Interfaces for Your Apps: Design a Cool iOS App and Build it From Start to Finish
objectives_summary: Build a cool app, starting with designing it in Sketch and then build it from start to finish with Swift and Xcode
Customize UIKit components like CollectionViews
Implement cool and custom transitions between ViewControllers

items.title: Complete Android 11 Jetpack Masterclass
items.headline: Become a Senior Android Developer by learning the Jetpack Suite using ROOM, Palette, MVVM, Retrofit, Navigation, WorkMgr
objectives_summary: Android Jetpack suite
ViewBinding and Animation(Splash Screen)
MVVM (Model View ViewModel)

items.title: Augmented Reality apps with ARKit and SceneKit on iOS
items.headline: Build real world apps on iOS using ARKit, SceneKit and SpriteKit - includes all source codes and 3D design files
objectives_summary: Understand ARKit and SceneKit using swift
Build Augmented reality apps for clients
Make money in the new AR Category on the Appstore

items.title: React Native Mobile App - design, code and publish
items.headline: Build your very first mobile app from start to finish
objectives_summary: Development and Publication of a Mobile App.
How to write class components, functional components and functional components with hooks.
How to integrate React Native Plugins.

items.title: Ionic 4 - Build PWA and Mobile Apps with Angular
items.headline: Build Progressive Web Apps, Native Android and iOS Apps with Ionic 4 and Angular
objectives_summary: Build Native Mobile Apps with Ionic 4
Build PWA with Ionic 4
Getting to know Ionic 4

items.title: The Complete IOS 9 & Xcode 7 Guide - Make 20 Applications
items.headline: A Complete Xcode 7 and iOS 9 Course with Swift 2 & Objective-C
objectives_summary: Full understanding of Xcode 7 and all it has to offer
Learn how to program for IOS 9 to create your own apps
Be able to support all devices and screen sizes
